_template_notes.en: This is a template file. Copy and modify for your project. The 'id' field must match the filename (without .json). Fields marked with '_note' are comments only and can be deleted.
_template_notes.zh: 这是模板文件。复制并修改用于您的项目。'id' 字段必须与文件名（不含 .json）匹配。标记为 '_note' 的字段仅为注释，可以删除。

title: Project Title Here
short_description: Brief description of the project for the project card display.
_pdf_note_en: Optional: Use empty string "" if no PDF link (button won't display)
_pdf_note_zh: 可选：如果没有 PDF 链接，使用空字符串 ""（按钮不会显示）
_code_note_en: Optional: Use empty string "" if no code link (button won't display)
_code_note_zh: 可选：如果没有代码链接，使用空字符串 ""（按钮不会显示）
_slides_note_en: Optional: Use empty string "" if no slides link (button won't display)
_slides_note_zh: 可选：如果没有幻灯片链接，使用空字符串 ""（按钮不会显示）
_project_page_note_en: Optional: Use empty string "" if no project page link (button won't display)
_project_page_note_zh: 可选：如果没有项目页面链接，使用空字符串 ""（按钮不会显示）

sections.title: Section Title 1
sections.text: Section content text goes here. You can write multiple paragraphs or detailed information about this section.

sections.title: Section Title 2
sections.text: Another section with its own content. Add as many sections as needed.

figures.caption: Figure caption text describing what the figure shows

tables.caption: Table caption describing the table content

_bibtex_note_en: Optional: Use empty string "" if no BibTeX citation (section won't display)
_bibtex_note_zh: 可选：如果没有 BibTeX 引用，使用空字符串 ""（该部分不会显示）
